p: MgAl-LDH was prepared by chloride ion ion-exchange on precursor [Mg 0.66Al 0.33(OH) 2](CO 3) 0.167∙nH 2O. A 20 mL mixed saline solution of NaCl (3.0 mol/L) and hydrochloric acid (5.0 mol/L) was added to the precursor under the protection of N 2 atmosphere, adjusts the pH at 6.0, 100 °C, 4 h. [Mg 0.66Al 0.33(OH) 2](CO 3) 0.167∙nH 2O was prepared through hydrothermal process in the sealed Teflon-lined stainless steel autoclave (30 mL). Typical reaction conditions are as follows: Mg(NO 3) 2·6H 2O (2.56 g, 10.0 mmol), Al(NO 3) 3·9H 2O (1.88 g, 5.0 mmol), urea (3.15 mL, 70.0 mmol) and H 2O (18.0 mL, 1000.0 mmol); 100 °C; 24 h.
